Posts.Content: On 8/20/2008 principal wrote:   On 6/3/2008 curenow wrote: Hi - My sister was diagnosed with CM in early April 08 and was diagnosed a year ago with Breast Cancer and received a double masectomy followed by chemo and radiation.  Since her CM diagnosis, she has had an omaya res and then a shunt placed in her head to keep her swelling to a minimum and she has tried thiotepa 1X and then metetrexate 2X.  We believe that the methotrexate is not working because after her last treatment, she had two seisures and her condition and side effects have worsened.  Can anyone share what other treatments they are receiving and how they are doing?  Thank you.   How is your sister doing?She is not doing so well. She lost most of her vision and has had a few vp shunt revisions due to infections or her filter clogging with cancer cells.  The most recent shunt surgery was two days ago where she had to have the shunt removed because it was infected.  She has not gotten any chemo in over a month because she was in the middle of being reevaluated (via PET, CT, etc.) to see if the methotrexate was working.  Her cell count was up. She currently has other complications as well. There is a lot of fluid in her lungs and her left side (neck and arm).  At this point, we are trying to make her comfortable by allevating the pain she is experiencing as the cancer has made it to the bone level.
